alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Macon, west central Peach, southwestern Crawford and eastern Taylor Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 608 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Garden Valley, or 10 miles southeast of Butler, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Butler, Reynolds, Nakomis, Lee Pope, Horns, Garden Valley, Hicks, Fickling Mill and Potterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
